name: Invasion Rush!
description:
This is my 2D shooter project

My most important modifications are:

1 - I added my own music to the Main Menu and all the levels. I made 3 small songs.

2 - I made 3 Levels. Level 1 is on Earth. Level 2 is in the Solar System. Level 3 is in another star system. They get progressively harder by raising the amount of enemies you have to defeat and introducing another one of the enemies from the given assets.

3 - Endless mode.

4 - Using the textures from the last project, I made sprites of the Sun, and planets of the solar system which are mainly in Level 2.

The smaller modifications are:

1 - I added a background to the main menu you can interact with.

2 - I added a retry level button to the game over screen.

Credits:

JHT's Planet Pixel Emporium ( http://planetpixelemporium.com/earth8081.html) for the earth texture I used for the background of Level 1.

Michigan State University for the textures from the last project I used to make my own solar system sprites for Level 2.

Created By Jean Toribio
